name: Village Farms International, Inc.
description: Village Farms International, Inc. is a leading agriculture company focused on the cultivation of high-quality, fresh produce and the production of cannabis products. Founded in 1987, Village Farms has established itself as a pioneer in sustainable agriculture, utilizing advanced greenhouse technology to grow fruits and vegetables year-round. The company's flagship product is its greenhouse-grown tomatoes, cucumbers, and bell peppers, which are sold under the Village Farms brand in major retailers across North America. In addition to its produce operations, Village Farms has expanded into the cannabis sector through its joint venture with Emerald Health Therapeutics, focusing on the cultivation and distribution of high-quality cannabis products. With a commitment to innovation and sustainability, Village Farms aims to reduce its environmental footprint while providing consumers with fresh, nutritious options. The company leverages cutting-edge agricultural practices and technology to enhance crop yields and minimize waste, making it a leader in the modern agriculture landscape. As it navigates the evolving cannabis market, Village Farms is positioned to capitalize on growth opportunities while remaining committed to its core values of quality, sustainability, and community engagement.

seo.meta_title: Village Farms International, Inc. | Sustainable Agriculture and Cannabis
seo.meta_description: Explore Village Farms International, Inc., a leader in sustainable agriculture and high-quality cannabis products. Learn about our innovative practices and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What products does Village Farms produce?
faq.answer: Village Farms produces fresh vegetables such as tomatoes, cucumbers, and bell peppers, as well as cannabis products.

faq.question: Where is Village Farms headquartered?
faq.answer: Village Farms is headquartered in Delta, British Columbia, Canada.

faq.question: What is Village Farms' approach to agriculture?
faq.answer: Village Farms utilizes advanced greenhouse technology to sustainably grow high-quality produce year-round.

faq.question: Is Village Farms involved in the cannabis industry?
faq.answer: Yes, Village Farms has a joint venture focused on the cultivation and distribution of cannabis products.
